title: Golf-Matsuyama up front about fitness but Champions Dinner menu a question mark
description: Japan's Hideki Matsuyama declared himself fit to defend his Masters title but the Champions Dinner menu remained a big question mark on Tuesday. Neck and back issues have disrupted Matsuyama's Masters preparations and the 30-year-old conceded that the last few weeks have been a struggle.
